Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that gives you a Kerbal-Engineer-style view in the VAB of the parts that consume and generate a resource and calculates the net change rate?

Use cases:

- Electric charge budget

- Intake air vs engine consumption

- KSP Interstellar heat management

- Mining v.s. smelting v.s. conversion into e.g. RocketParts

- Regenerative life support
